content.text:
# Old Town (Swindon ward)

Old Town is an electoral ward in the Borough of Swindon, England. Since 2012, the ward has elected three councillors to Swindon Borough Council.
History
The ward was created in 2012.
Geography
The ward covers the oldest areas of original Swindon. The ward is part of the Swindon South parliamentary constituency.
Demographics
In the 2021 census, the population of the ward was 11,160.
References
See also
* List of electoral divisions and wards in Wiltshire
